name: Learning - UI/UX Travel Apps
description:
Hi this is my first time trying to make UI/UX for Travel apps in mobile. Corona pandemic make us cannot travel to any places and yeah making this is project make me really happy and wishing we can travel after this pandemic end.


The apps intent to give information about travel destination suggestion and news about that country. People can find the suggested destination via explore and they can swipe through other destination. People can favorite the places they like as a reminder to that places.


PS- since this is my first process in learning UI/UX wishing people can help me. Thankyouuu!
